metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8934 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: hw/ppc/spapr.c in QEMU through 3.1.0 allows Information Exposure because the hypervisor shares the /proc/device-tree/system-id and /proc/device-tree/model system attributes with a guest.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> see debian bug for information on this change that may break existing functionnality. This fix will break ppc migration.  we will not be fixing this issue in stable releases, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
